Test Name: Shrimp Specific IgE, Total IgE, and Serum Analytes
Purpose: To quantify Shrimp-specific IgE, total IgE, and other serum analytes for diagnostic assessment and patient management.
Container: Serum collection tube (e.g., red-top or serum separator)
Equipment: Automated SHRIMP IgE analyzer, automated Total IgE analyzer, spectrophotometer/serum chemistry analyzer
